  • Constructor Details

    • Undead

      public Undead​(String name)
      Constructor. All Undeads are represented by an 'u' and have 30 hit points.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of this Undead

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Override Enemies' playTurn to add the instant death dice
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class Enemies
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      an action to do
      See Also:
      Actor.playTurn(Actions, Action, GameMap, Display)

      public void resetInstance()

    • isExist

      public boolean isExist()
      Description copied from interface: Resettable
      A useful method to clean up the list of instances in the ResetManager class
      Specified by:
      isExist in interface Resettable
      Overrides:
      isExist in class Enemies
      Returns:
      the existence of the instance in the game. for example, true to keep it permanent, or false if instance needs to be removed from the reset list.

    • kill

      kill the undead instantly.

    • getIntrinsicWeapon

      protected IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()
      Description copied from class: Actor
      Creates and returns an intrinsic weapon. By default, the Actor 'punches' for 5 damage. Override this method to create an Actor with more interesting descriptions and/or different damage.
      Overrides:
      getIntrinsicWeapon in class Actor
      Returns:
      a freshly-instantiated IntrinsicWeapon
